suggestions.description:

command.title: command
command.description:
A command where each line in the output is suggestion

body.title: body
examples: Are you sure you want to push to the remote?

value.title: value
value.description:
the value that will be used in the command

filter.title: filter
filter.description:

loadingText.title: loading text
loadingText.description:

description.title: description
examples: Checkout a remote branch as FETCH_HEAD

stream.title: stream
stream.description:

showOutput.title: show output
showOutput.description:

after.title: after
after.description:

checkForConflicts.title: check for conflicts
checkForConflicts.description:
